title: Marrow
summaries: The Marrow is a Hardmode bow that has a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance to be dropped by Skeleton Archers. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is capable of autofire.

When fired, the next available arrow will instead be converted into a special [img:Bone Arrow]Bone Arrow, which is not to be confused with the visually similar Bone Arrow item. These Bone Arrows fire at higher velocities than average arrows and suffer minimal drop along their course, giving the Marrow a much straighter shot than most bows. However, while the used arrow's base damage is accounted for, special properties of converted arrows are entirely lost.
The Marrow has a base 9% <linked>critical strike chance</linked>, as opposed to the usual 4%.
